title: How to Make White Chocolate Fondue With Chocolate Chip Biscotti

steps.headline: Preheat the oven to 350 °F (177 °C), gas mark 4.
Line a baking sheet with baking parchment.
Mix all flour, salt, sugar, and baking powder into a bowl.
Make a well in the middle of the mix.
Put the two egg yolks and the lemon rind and juice in the well.
Roll dough into ball and flatten.
Chop and toast almonds and put in the dough.
Add the chocolate chips into the dough
Style dough until it resembles the shape of a ciabatta loaf.
Put on baking sheet and bake in oven for 25 minutes
Cut into thumb sized pieces, skewer, and let cool.
To make the fondue, boil water into a bottom pot of a two pot set.
In top pot add the cream, the white chocolate and the butter.
Leave top pot over the boiling water until melted completely.
Serve and have a good time.

Add the chocolate chips into the dough  Roll dough into sausage shape.  Style dough until it resembles the shape of a ciabatta loaf.  Put on baking sheet and bake in oven for 25 minutes  Cut into thumb sized pieces, skewer, and let cool.  To make the fondue, boil water into a bottom pot of a two pot set.  In top pot add the cream, the white chocolate and the butter.  Leave top pot over the boiling water until melted completely.  Serve and have a good time.
